   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssh_dbg_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("ssh.hrl").
   27: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([
   30:          suite/0,
   31:          all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_testcase/2
   37:         ]).
   38: 
   39: -export([
   40:          all_dbg/1,
   41:          cb_basic/1,
   42:          cb_macros_print/1,
   43:          cb_print/1,
   44:          dbg_alg_terminate/1,
   45:          dbg_authentication/1,
   46:          dbg_basic/1,
   47:          dbg_channels/1,
   48:          dbg_connections/1,
   49:          dbg_ssh_messages/1
   50:         ]).
   51: 
   52: 
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: 
   57: suite() ->
   58:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   59:      {timetrap,{seconds,60}}].
   60: 
   61: all() -> 
   62:     [{group, dbg},
   63:      {group, circ_buf}
   64:     ].
   65: 
   66: groups() ->
   67:     [{dbg, [], [dbg_basic,
   68:                 dbg_alg_terminate,
   69:                 dbg_ssh_messages,
   70:                 dbg_connections,
   71:                 dbg_channels,
   72:                 dbg_authentication,
   73:                 all_dbg]},
   74:      {circ_buf, [], [cb_basic,
   75:                      cb_print,
   76:                      cb_macros_print
   77:                     ]}
   78:     ].
   79: 
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(begin
   83:                       ssh:start(),
   84:                       setup_dirs(Config)
   85:                   end).
   86: 
   87: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   88:     ssh:stop().
   89: 
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   92:     Config.
   93: 
   94: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   95:     ssh_dbg:stop(),
   96:     Config.
   97: 
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: -define(USR, "foo").
  100: -define(PWD, "bar").
  101: 
  102: -define(DBG_RECEIVE(ExpectPfx, Ref, C, Pid),
  103:         receive
  104:             {Ref, [_, C, ExpectPfx++_]} ->
  105:                 ok
  106: 
  107:         after 5000 ->
  108:                 ct:log("~p:~p Messages:~n~p",
  109:                        [?MODULE,?LINE, process_info(self(),messages)]),
  110:                 ssh_dbg:stop(),
  111:                 ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  112:                 ct:fail("No '~s' debug message",[ExpectPfx])
  113:         end
  114:        ).
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: 
  119: dbg_basic(_Config) ->
  120:     L0 = ssh_dbg:start(),
  121:     true = is_pid(whereis(ssh_dbg)),
  122:     true = is_list(L0),
  123: 
  124:     {ok,L0} = ssh_dbg:on(),
  125:     {ok,L0} = ssh_dbg:on(),
  126: 
  127:     L1 = [hd(L0)],
  128:     {ok,L1} = ssh_dbg:off(tl(L0)),
  129: 
  130:     {ok,L1} = ssh_dbg:go_on(),
  131: 
  132:     {ok,[]} = ssh_dbg:off(),
  133:     {ok,[]} = ssh_dbg:off(),
  134:     
  135:     ok = ssh_dbg:stop(),
  136:     undefined = whereis(ssh_dbg).
  137:     
  138: 
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: dbg_alg_terminate(Config) ->
  141:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  142:     UserDir   = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  143:     
  144:     Ref = ssh_dbg_start(),
  145:     {ok,[alg,connections,terminate]} = ssh_dbg:on([alg,terminate,connections]),
  146:     {ok,[alg,terminate]} = ssh_dbg:off(connections), % just testing that terminate is not canceled
  147:     
  148:     Parent = self(),
  149:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  150: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  151:                                              {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]},
  152:                                              {connectfun, fun(_,_,_) ->
  153:                                                                   Parent ! {daemon_c,Ref,self()}
  154:                                                           end},
  155: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  156:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  157: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  158:                                           {user,?USR},
  159:                                           {password,?PWD},
  160: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  161: 
  162:     %% Daemon connection ref (D):
  163:     D = receive
  164:             {daemon_c,Ref,D0} -> D0
  165:         end,
  166:     ct:log("~p:~p~nC = ~p, D=~p",[?MODULE,?LINE, C, D]),
  167: 
  168:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Negotiated algorithms:", Ref, C, Pid),
  169:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Negotiated algorithms:", Ref, D, Pid),
  170:     
  171:     ssh:close(C),
  172:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Connection Terminating:", Ref, C, Pid),
  173:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Connection Terminating:", Ref, D, Pid),
  174: 
  175:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [C,D], Pid).
  176: 
  177: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: dbg_connections(Config) ->
  179:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  180:     UserDir   = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  181:     
  182:     Ref = ssh_dbg_start(),
  183:     {ok,[connections,terminate]} = ssh_dbg:on([connections, terminate]),
  184:     {ok,[connections]} = ssh_dbg:off(terminate), % Just testing that terminate doesn't cancel connections
  185:     
  186:     Parent = self(),
  187:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  188: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  189:                                              {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]},
  190:                                              {connectfun, fun(_,_,_) ->
  191:                                                                   Parent ! {daemon_c,Ref,self()}
  192:                                                           end},
  193: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  194:     
  195:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting LISTENER on ", Ref, _, Pid),
  196: 
  197:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  198: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  199:                                           {user,?USR},
  200:                                           {password,?PWD},
  201: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  202: 
  203:     %% Daemon connection ref (D):
  204:     D = receive
  205:             {daemon_c,Ref,D0} -> D0
  206:         end,
  207:     ct:log("~p:~p~nC = ~p, D=~p",[?MODULE,?LINE, C, D]),
  208: 
  209:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting server connection:", Ref, D, Pid),
  210:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting client connection:", Ref, C, Pid),
  211:     
  212:     ssh:close(C),
  213:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Connection Terminating:", Ref, C, Pid),
  214:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Connection Terminating:", Ref, D, Pid),
  215: 
  216:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [C,D], Pid).
  217: 
  218: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  219: dbg_authentication(Config) ->
  220:     Ref = ssh_dbg_start(),
  221:     {ok,[authentication]} = ssh_dbg:on([authentication]),
  222:     
  223:     Parent = self(),
  224:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, system_dir(Config)},
  225: 					     {user_dir, user_dir(Config)},
  226:                                              {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]},
  227:                                              {connectfun, fun(_,_,_) ->
  228:                                                                   Parent ! {daemon_c,Ref,self()}
  229:                                                           end},
  230: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  231:     
  232:     %% ---- Check password ----
  233:     Cpwd = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  234:                                              {user_dir, user_dir(Config)},
  235:                                              {user,?USR},
  236:                                              {password,?PWD},
  237:                                              {auth_methods,"password"},
  238:                                              {user_interaction, false}]),
  239:     Cpwd_d = daemon_connection_ref(Ref, Cpwd),
  240: 
  241:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Service ssh-userauth accepted", Ref, Cpwd, Pid),
  242:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Query for accepted methods", Ref, Cpwd, Pid),
  243:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Peer queries auth methods", Ref, Cpwd_d, Pid),
  244:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Server supports", Ref, Cpwd, Pid),
  245:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Try auth with", Ref, Cpwd, Pid),
  246:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Peer client authorized", Ref, Cpwd_d, Pid),
  247:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Success", Ref, Cpwd, Pid),
  248:     ssh:close(Cpwd),
  249:     fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [Cpwd,Cpwd_d]),
  250: 
  251:     %% ---- Check keyboard-interactive ----
  252:     Ckbi = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  253:                                              {user_dir, user_dir(Config)},
  254:                                              {user,?USR},
  255:                                              {password,?PWD},
  256:                                              {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  257:                                              {user_interaction, false}]),
  258:     Ckbi_d = daemon_connection_ref(Ref, Ckbi),
  259: 
  260:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Service ssh-userauth accepted", Ref, Ckbi, Pid),
  261:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Query for accepted methods", Ref, Ckbi, Pid),
  262:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Peer queries auth methods", Ref, Ckbi_d, Pid),
  263:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Server supports", Ref, Ckbi, Pid),
  264:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Try auth with", Ref, Ckbi, Pid),
  265:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Ask peer client for password", Ref, Ckbi_d, Pid),
  266:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Success", Ref, Ckbi, Pid),
  267:     ssh:close(Ckbi),
  268:     fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [Ckbi,Ckbi_d]),
  269: 
  270:     %% ---- Check publickey ----
  271:     Cpkey = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  272:                                              {user_dir, user_dir(Config)},
  273:                                              {auth_methods,"publickey"},
  274:                                              {user_interaction, false}]),
  275:     Cpkey_d = daemon_connection_ref(Ref, Cpkey),
  276: 
  277:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Service ssh-userauth accepted", Ref, Cpkey, Pid),
  278:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Query for accepted methods", Ref, Cpkey, Pid),
  279:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Peer queries auth methods", Ref, Cpkey_d, Pid),
  280:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Server supports", Ref, Cpkey, Pid),
  281:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Try auth with", Ref, Cpkey, Pid),
  282:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH srvr: Peer client authorized", Ref, Cpkey_d, Pid),
  283:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("AUTH client: Success", Ref, Cpkey, Pid),
  284:     ssh:close(Cpkey),
  285:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [Cpkey,Cpkey_d], Pid).
  286: 
  287: 
  288: daemon_connection_ref(Ref,C) ->
  289:     D =
  290:         receive
  291:             {daemon_c,Ref,D0} -> D0
  292:         end,
  293:     ct:log("~p:~p~nC = ~p, D=~p",[?MODULE,?LINE, C, D]),
  294:     D.
  295: 
  296: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  297: dbg_ssh_messages(Config) ->
  298:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  299:     UserDir   = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  300:     
  301:     Parent = self(),
  302:     Ref = make_ref(),
  303:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  304: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  305:                                              {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]},
  306:                                              {connectfun, fun(_,_,_) ->
  307:                                                                   Parent ! {daemon_c,Ref,self()}
  308:                                                           end},
  309: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  310: 
  311:     ssh_dbg_start(Ref),
  312:     {ok,[ssh_messages]} = ssh_dbg:on([ssh_messages]),
  313: 
  314:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  315: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  316:                                           {user,?USR},
  317:                                           {password,?PWD},
  318: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  319: 
  320:     %% Daemon connection ref (D):
  321:     D = receive
  322:             {daemon_c,Ref,D0} -> D0
  323:         end,
  324:     ct:log("~p:~p~nC = ~p, D=~p",[?MODULE,?LINE, C, D]),
  325: 
  326:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send hello message:", Ref, C, Pid),
  327:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received hello message:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  328: 
  329:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send hello message:", Ref, D, Pid),
  330:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received hello message:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  331: 
  332:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEXINIT:", Ref, C, Pid),
  333:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEXINIT:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  334: 
  335:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEXINIT:", Ref, D, Pid),
  336:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEXINIT:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  337: 
  338:     case atom_to_list( (ssh_connection_handler:alg(C))#alg.kex ) of
  339:         "curve"++_ ->
  340:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_INIT:",  Ref, C, Pid),
  341:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_INIT:",       Ref, D, Pid),
  342:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_REPLY:", Ref, D, Pid),
  343:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_REPLY:",      Ref, C, Pid);
  344: 
  345:         "ecdh-"++_ ->
  346:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_INIT:",  Ref, C, Pid),
  347:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_INIT:",       Ref, D, Pid),
  348:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_REPLY:", Ref, D, Pid),
  349:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_ECDH_REPLY:",      Ref, C, Pid);
  350: 
  351:         "diffie-hellman-group-exchange-"++_ ->
  352:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_REQUEST:", Ref, C, Pid),
  353:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_REQUEST:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  354:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_GROUP:",   Ref, D, Pid),
  355:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_GROUP:",        Ref, C, Pid),
  356:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_INIT:",    Ref, C, Pid),
  357:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_INIT:",         Ref, D, Pid),
  358:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_REPLY:",   Ref, D, Pid),
  359:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEX_DH_GEX_REPLY:",        Ref, C, Pid);
  360: 
  361:         "diffie-hellman-group"++_ ->
  362:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEXDH_INIT:",  Ref, C, Pid),
  363:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEXDH_INIT:",       Ref, D, Pid),
  364:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_KEXDH_REPLY:", Ref, D, Pid),
  365:             ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_KEXDH_REPLY:",      Ref, C, Pid)
  366:     end,
  367: 
  368: 
  369:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_NEWKEYS:", Ref, C, Pid),
  370:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_NEWKEYS:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  371: 
  372:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_NEWKEYS:", Ref, D, Pid),
  373:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_NEWKEYS:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  374:     
  375:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_SERVICE_REQUEST:", Ref, C, Pid),
  376:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_SERVICE_REQUEST:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  377:     
  378:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_SERVICE_ACCEPT:", Ref, D, Pid),
  379:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_SERVICE_ACCEPT:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  380:     
  381:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_REQUEST:", Ref, C, Pid),
  382:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_REQUEST:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  383: 
  384:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_FAILURE:", Ref, D, Pid),
  385:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_FAILURE:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  386:     
  387:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_REQUEST:", Ref, C, Pid),
  388:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_REQUEST:",      Ref, D, Pid),
  389: 
  390:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Going to send SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_SUCCESS:", Ref, D, Pid),
  391:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Received SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_SUCCESS:",      Ref, C, Pid),
  392: 
  393: 
  394:     UnexpectedMsgs =
  395:         dbg_SKIP(Ref,
  396:                  [S_R ++ P ++ ":" || P <- ["SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_REQUEST",
  397:                                            "SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_INFO_REQUEST",
  398:                                            "SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_INFO_RESPONSE",
  399:                                            "SSH_MSG_USERAUTH_FAILURE",
  400:                                            "SSH_MSG_EXT_INFO"
  401:                                           ],
  402:                                      S_R <- ["Going to send ",
  403:                                              "Received "
  404:                                             ]
  405:                  ]),
  406: 
  407:     ssh:close(C),
  408:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(UnexpectedMsgs, Ref, [C,D], Pid).
  409: 
  410: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  411: dbg_channels(Config) ->
  412:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  413:     UserDir   = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  414:     
  415:     Ref = ssh_dbg_start(),
  416:     {ok,[channels,connections]} = ssh_dbg:on([connections, channels]),
  417:     
  418:     Parent = self(),
  419:     TimeoutShell =
  420:         fun() ->
  421:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  422:                 timer:sleep(1000),
  423:                 Parent ! {daemon_channel,Ref,self()},
  424:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  425:         end,
  426:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  427: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  428:                                              {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]},
  429:                                              {connectfun, fun(_,_,_) ->
  430:                                                                   Parent ! {daemon_c,Ref,self()}
  431:                                                           end},
  432:                                              {shell, fun(_User) ->
  433:                                                              spawn(TimeoutShell)
  434:                                                      end
  435:                                              },
  436: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  437:     
  438:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting LISTENER on ", Ref, _, Pid),
  439: 
  440:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  441:                                           {user_dir, UserDir},
  442:                                           {user,?USR},
  443:                                           {password,?PWD},
  444:                                           {user_interaction, false}]),
  445:     {ok, Ch0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(C, infinity),
  446:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(C, Ch0),
  447:     
  448:     %% Daemon connection ref (D):
  449:     D = receive {daemon_c,Ref,D0} -> D0 end,
  450: 
  451:     %% Daemon channel (Dch):
  452:     Dch = receive {daemon_channel,Ref,Dch0} -> Dch0 end,
  453:     ct:log("~p:~p~nC = ~p, D=~p, Dch=~p~n~s",[?MODULE,?LINE, C, D, Dch, ssh_info:string()]),
  454: 
  455:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting server connection:", Ref, D, Pid),
  456:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Starting client connection:", Ref, C, Pid),
  457:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Server Channel Starting:",    Ref, _, Pid),
  458:     ?DBG_RECEIVE("Server Channel Terminating:", Ref, _, Pid),
  459: 
  460:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, [C,D], Pid).
  461: 
  462: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  463: all_dbg(Config) ->
  464:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  465:     UserDir   = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  466: 
  467:     Dir0 = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
  468:     file:make_dir(Dir0),
  469:     Dir = w2l(Config, Dir0),
  470:     ct:log("~p:~p created the directory~nsDir0 = ~p~nDir  = ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Dir0,Dir]),
  471: 
  472:     AllTags = ssh_dbg:start(),
  473:     {ok,AllTags} = ssh_dbg:on(AllTags),
  474: 
  475:     {_, Host, Port} =
  476: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  477: 			     {user_dir,   UserDir},
  478: 			     {user_passwords, [{?USR,?PWD}]}
  479:                             ]),
  480: 
  481:     {ok, ChPid, _C} =
  482:         ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  483:                                [{user_dir, UserDir},
  484:                                 {user,?USR},
  485:                                 {password,?PWD},
  486:                                 {user_interaction, false},
  487:                                 {silently_accept_hosts, true}
  488:                                ]),
  489: 
  490:     {ok, _Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(ChPid, Dir).
  491: 
  492: 
  493: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  494: cb_basic(_Config) ->
  495:     %% Check that the circular buffer is disabled at start:
  496:     [] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_list(),
  497:     disabled = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(anything),
  498:     [] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_list(),
  499:     %% Start it and enter three values, first is duplicated;
  500:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_start(3),
  501:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v1),
  502:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v1),
  503:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v2),
  504:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v3),
  505:     [{v3,_,1}, {v2,_,1}, {v1,_,2}] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_list(),
  506:     %% Check that a fourth value erase the first entered:
  507:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v4),
  508:     [{v4,_,1}, {v3,_,1}, {v2,_,1}] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_list(),
  509:     %% Check that entering a value that is in the tail but not in the head is treated as a new value:
  510:     ok = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v2),
  511:     [{v2,_,1}, {v4,_,1}, {v3,_,1}] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_list(),
  512:     %% Stop and check that the buffer is returned:
  513:     [{v2,_,1}, {v4,_,1}, {v3,_,1}] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_stop_clear(),
  514:     %% Stopping a stopped buffer returns empty:
  515:     [] = ssh_dbg:cbuf_stop_clear(),
  516:     %% Check that a value can't be entered in a stopped buffer:
  517:     disabled = ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(v2).
  518: 
  519: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  520: cb_print(_Config) ->
  521:     ssh_dbg:cbuf_start(),
  522:     [begin
  523:          ssh_dbg:cbuf_in(V),
  524:          ct:log("Enter ~p",[V])
  525:      end || V <- lists:seq(1,10)],
  526:     ct:log("~s",[ssh_dbg:fmt_cbuf_items()]),
  527:     ssh_dbg:cbuf_stop_clear().
  528: 
  529: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  530: cb_macros_print(_Config) ->
  531:     ssh_dbg:cbuf_start(),
  532:     [begin
  533:          V = {test,V0},
  534:          ?CIRC_BUF_IN(V),
  535:          ct:log("Enter ~p",[V])
  536:      end || V0 <- lists:seq(1,5)],
  537:     ct:log("~s",[ssh_dbg:fmt_cbuf_items()]),
  538:     ssh_dbg:cbuf_stop_clear().
  539: 
  540: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  541: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  542: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  543: 
  544: ssh_dbg_start() ->
  545:     ssh_dbg_start(make_ref()).
  546: 
  547: ssh_dbg_start(Ref) ->
  548:     Parent = self(),
  549:     [_|_] = ssh_dbg:start(fun(_F,A) ->
  550:                                   Parent ! {Ref,A}
  551:                           end),
  552:     Ref.
  553: 
  554: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  555: setup_dirs(Config) ->
  556:     ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  557:            [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  558:     Config.
  559: 
  560: system_dir(Config) -> filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system).
  561: 
  562: user_dir(Config) -> proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config).
  563: 
  564: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  565: queued_msgs(Ref, Conns) ->
  566:     queued_msgs(Ref, Conns, []).
  567: 
  568: queued_msgs(Ref, Conns, Acc) ->
  569:     receive
  570:         {Ref, [_, C, _]=Msg} ->
  571:             case is_list(Conns) andalso lists:member(C, Conns) of
  572:                 true ->
  573:                     queued_msgs(Ref, [Msg|Acc]);
  574:                 false ->
  575:                     queued_msgs(Ref, Conns, Acc)
  576:             end
  577:     after 0 ->
  578:             lists:reverse(Acc)
  579:     end.
  580: 
  581: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  582: fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, Conns) ->
  583:     fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(queued_msgs(Ref,Conns), Ref, Conns).
  584: 
  585: fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Msgs, _Ref, _Conns) ->
  586:     case Msgs of
  587:         [] ->
  588:             ok;
  589:         _ ->
  590:             ct:log("Unexpected messages:~n~p",[Msgs]),
  591:             ct:fail("Unexpected messages")
  592:     end.
  593: 
  594: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  595: stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Ref, Conns, DaemonPid) ->
  596:     stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(queued_msgs(Ref,Conns), Ref, Conns, DaemonPid).
  597: 
  598: stop_and_fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Msgs, Ref, Conns, DaemonPid) ->
  599:     ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  600:     fail_if_unhandled_dbg_msgs(Msgs, Ref, Conns).
  601: 
  602: 
  603: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  604: dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes) ->
  605:     dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes, []).
  606: 
  607: dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes, UnexpectedAcc) ->
  608:     receive
  609:         {Ref, [_, _C, Msg]} when is_tuple(Msg) ->
  610:             %% filter non ssh_dbg messages, for example from dbg:tp(..) etc
  611:             dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes, UnexpectedAcc);
  612:         {Ref, [_, _C, Msg]=M} ->
  613:             case lists:any(
  614:                    fun(Pfx) ->
  615:                            try lists:prefix(Pfx, Msg)
  616:                            catch _:_ -> false
  617:                            end
  618:                    end, Prefixes) of
  619:                 true ->
  620:                     ct:log("Skip:~n~p", [M]),
  621:                     dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes, UnexpectedAcc);
  622:                 false ->
  623:                     dbg_SKIP(Ref, Prefixes, [Msg|UnexpectedAcc])
  624:             end
  625:     after 0 ->
  626:             lists:reverse(UnexpectedAcc)
  627:     end.
  628: 
  629: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  630: %% w2l(P) ->
  631: %%     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
  632: 
  633: w2l(Config, P) ->
  634:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
  635:     W2L(P).
  636:
